ComicInfo.Title: Good for the Soul, Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary: The most talked about comic of the year continues from DYNAMITE ENTERTAINMENT, writer/co-creator Garth Ennis and artist/co-creator Darick Robertson! Part three of the four part "Good For The Soul": Hughie and Annie January continue to get closer while Hughie's surveillance unearths more clues about the resurrection of Blarney Cock. Plus: Mother's Milk goes home to momma and Hughie has a "facial incident."
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-19 09:19:42. [CVDB126712]
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Noir, Blarney Cock, Butcher, James Stillwell, Jamie, Mother's Milk, Queen Maeve, Starlight, Terror, The Homelander, Wee Hughie
ComicInfo.Teams: The Boys, The Seven, Vought American
ComicInfo.Locations: Central Park, New York City, New York State, The Bronx
